description: The generic collection point request schema

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration to which we're sending this request

reference.description: A (preferably) unique reference for this collection point request

callbackUri.description: Address to which the collection point response(s) can be POSTed.  Ideally, collection point response(s) should be POSTed here before the carrier integration responds to this request.
